description: "JUST A PIG" is a fun collection with 100 pieces, Created by Tiagobatista20 and designed by ZEBRA. Brazilian artist.  Nothing but a pig, which brings together the most diverse characters, to share and honor art, without the submission to exploitation made by the NFT World.  We seek to exalt the equality between the characters, as all are prosperous for what is to come, leaving collectors ecstatic about the possibilities.
